requirements.text: Establish a cohesive visual theme (layout, typography pairing, spacing system, and section styling) appropriate for a modern church website, using warm neutrals and the provided royal gold/deep blue/orange/purple palette; ensure consistency across all pages.

quotes: I want to try, and I'll give you colors as well for the website, so bear with me.

acceptanceCriteria: Typography, spacing, and component styling appear consistent across pages (headings, body text, cards/sections, and CTAs).
The overall design uses warm neutrals (#F5F1E8) and avoids introducing unrelated dominant colors that conflict with the provided palette.

requirements.text: Add primary calls-to-action in appropriate locations (e.g., header and Home page) that route to key pages: ‚ÄúPlan Your Visit‚Äù (routes to the ‚ÄúWhat to Expect When You Visit‚Äù content), ‚ÄúWatch Live‚Äù (placeholder link area on Connect page/section), and ‚ÄúSchedule a Meeting‚Äù (routes to the appointment request form).

quotes: Use for: ‚Ä¢ Primary buttons (‚ÄúPlan Your Visit‚Äù, ‚ÄúGive‚Äù, ‚ÄúWatch Live‚Äù)

acceptanceCriteria: ‚ÄúPlan Your Visit‚Äù routes the user to the visit/expectations content.
‚ÄúSchedule a Meeting‚Äù routes the user to the appointment request form.
‚ÄúWatch Live‚Äù is present as a CTA and links to a clearly labeled placeholder destination that the user can later edit.

constraints: Use React + TypeScript with Tailwind/Shadcn and React Query for data fetching/state.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add migration.mo if persistent-state upgrades require it.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implementing actual live streaming, sermon hosting, or integrating with external video platforms (only placeholders/links).
Third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity (not required for this build).
Real-time chat, push notifications, email/SMS messaging integrations.
A full admin dashboard for managing submissions (persistence and basic retrieval only).
